ENGLISH: United Nations General Assembly Resolution 2994, The Declaration of the United Nations Conference on the Human Environment.
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 2994, The Declaration of the United Nations Conference on the Human Environment, has been opened for voting.
Shall we receive notifications when nations decide their vote on the current UN Resolution undergoing a vote?\nThese can be turned off at any time by an international decision.
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 2994, The Declaration of the United Nations Conference on the Human Environment, has been defeated by vote in the United Nations General Assembly.
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 2994, The Declaration of the United Nations Conference on the Human Environment, has passed its vote in the United Nations General Assembly.
UN Vote on Human Environment Declaration

We have the opportunity to vote on United Nations General Assembly Resolution 2994, The Declaration of the United Nations Conference on the Human Environment.\nWe can either vote For it, Abstain, or vote Against it.
